meta.name: TA-DellEMC_VMAX
meta.displayName: Dell EMC PowerMax Add-on for Splunk Enterprise

entity.label: Name
entity.help: Enter a unique name for the data input

validators.errorMsg: Input Name must start with a letter and followed by alphabetic letters, digits or underscores.
Length of input name should be between 1 and 100

entity.label: Interval
entity.help: Time interval of input in seconds.

validators.errorMsg: Interval must be an integer.
Length of index name should be between 1 and 80.
Max length of text input is 8192

entity.label: Unisphere Port
entity.help: Unisphere default port is 8443

validators.errorMsg: Max length of text input is 8192
Max length of text input is 8192
Max length of password is 8192

entity.label: Array ID
entity.help: This is the 12-digit array ID

validators.errorMsg: Max length of text input is 8192

entity.label: Enable SSL
entity.help: Enable SSL communication between Splunk and Unisphere

entity.label: SSL Cert Location
entity.help: (Optional) Leave this blank if the Unisphere SSL certificate is loaded into the system, otherwise you can specify the direct path to the .pem certificate

validators.errorMsg: Max length of text input is 8192

entity.label: REST Request Timeout
entity.help: (Optional) Default REST request timeout value in seconds, default is 60, for more information please consult the TA user guide

validators.errorMsg: Max length of text input is 8192
